<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord">StatepointRelocationRecord</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord/#ae85ec708fd4e537d4b331ce7f94acb2c"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord/#ae85ec708fd4e537d4b331ce7f94acb2c">RelocType</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Value did not need to be relocated and can be used directly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord/#ae85ec708fd4e537d4b331ce7f94acb2cae1c6c7a77fab355eb08576b3bd29b924"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord/#ae85ec708fd4e537d4b331ce7f94acb2cae1c6c7a77fab355eb08576b3bd29b924">NoRelocate</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Value was spilled to stack and needs filled at the gc.relocate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord/#ae85ec708fd4e537d4b331ce7f94acb2ca4e2303faf0f163fb7a4af33f778884e8"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord/#ae85ec708fd4e537d4b331ce7f94acb2ca4e2303faf0f163fb7a4af33f778884e8">Spill</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Value was lowered to tied def and gc.relocate should be replaced with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// copy from vreg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord/#ae85ec708fd4e537d4b331ce7f94acb2cad7321692f596ba5573d414ce3452c26f"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord/#ae85ec708fd4e537d4b331ce7f94acb2cad7321692f596ba5573d414ce3452c26f">VReg</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Value was lowered to tied def and gc.relocate should be replaced with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SDValue kept in StatepointLoweringInfo structure. This valid for local</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// relocates only.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord/#ae85ec708fd4e537d4b331ce7f94acb2cafcf3e806047173bc7c8581b355375870"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionloweringinfo/statepointrelocationrecord/#ae85ec708fd4e537d4b331ce7f94acb2cafcf3e806047173bc7c8581b355375870">SDValueNode</a>,</span></CodeLine>
